content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First, keep in mind that usually contract is at least 1 year long. Otherwise, the price will be significantly higher and rental considered as short term\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It's worth to start with market research and evaluate pros and cons important for you: area, size, type of apartment, options of residential complexes, infrastructure, convenience of transport/traffic jam at different times, etc. We recommend that you look at and evaluate the market by yourself, even if the search for an apartment is done by a real estate agent. A list of aggregators can be found here.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Then decide on your budget you can afford and criteria (both desirable and unacceptable). For example, working area, if the new building is mandatory, city center or districts, or not the last floor, are suburbs acceptable. This is important for any search option (even with an agent â€“ you need to share your exact expectations). According to the adaptation buddy pool survey, average rental prices for 1 room apartment as of September 2020:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":19584,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3bc3c5e2-8761-42e4-8fd6-eea6150c8c0f/Capture.2JPG.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3bc3c5e2-8761-42e4-8fd6-eea6150c8c0f/Capture.2JPG.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.2JPG.JPG\",\"name\":\"Capture.2JPG.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3bc3c5e2-8761-42e4-8fd6-eea6150c8c0f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":687,\"height\":128},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The final price usually consists of several parts:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The rental price\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (what you pay to the landlord) is a monthly payment.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Czynsz\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - administrative payments for the  apartment (not including water, electricity, internet, tv, etc). May include security, landscaping, advance payment for standard amounts of water and heat usage, parking. Usually from 300 to 800 zl. It's worth to ask about payments before considering apartment. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Kaucja\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a deposit for property. Usually 1 to 3 monthly payments. If there are no claims after check-out, then it is returned\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
